rows.label: qev092908_MSG0015
rows.name:
I don't know what would have happened
if you hadn't been here[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092908_MSG0040
rows.name:
I'm fine.
Thanks to you handling it so calmly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092908_MSG0050
rows.name:
Asking you was the right choice.
Guess I'm lucky, huh? Haha.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092908_SEL0070
rows.name: Ask about the Dolls from earlier.

rows.label: qev092908_MSG0080
rows.name:
It doesn't look like
they just happened to be passing by.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092908_MSG0090
rows.name:
I feel like I've seen those twin-like
machines somewhere before[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092908_MSG0100
rows.name:
Hmm, I can't remember[ST:wide ]—
I'll try looking it up when I get back.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092908_MSG0110
rows.name:
Well then[ST:wide ]— The request is finished for now!
Thanks for your hard work.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092908_MSG0120
rows.name: I'll ask you for help again if the chance arises.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092908_MSG0130
rows.name:
Oh, hanging out personally is also very welcome.
I plan on staying in NLA for a while.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092908_MSG0140
rows.name:
If you need me, don't hesitate to ask.
I'll lend you my strength.[ST:wait ]
